# VirtualScrollerExactPosition type

Numeric snapshot of scroll position

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type VirtualScrollerExactPosition = number;
```

## Example

`5.3` stands for item at index `5` + `30%` of its size.

Used to save/restore scroll position
